format: html
execute: 
  echo: false
---

Tohle připojí balíčky. Aby to nevypisovalo blbosti, dal jse tam include: false.

```{r}
#| include: false

library(tidyverse)
library(searchConsoleR)

scr_auth(email = Sys.getenv("MY_GOOGLE_ACCOUNT"))
```

```{r}
list_websites() |> 
  filter(str_detect(siteUrl, "marekp"))
```

```{r}
search_analytics(
  siteURL = "http://www.marekp.cz/",
  dimensions = c("query"),
  dimensionFilterExp = c(
    "country==cze",
    "page!*harmonica"
  ),
  rowLimit = 1000000
) |> 
  filter(impressions > 10, clicks > 5) |> 
  mutate(ctr2 = ctr * 100)
```
